headline: Berkshire Cuts Amazon Stake, Makes Bets on New York Times
summary: Omaha, Nebraska-based Berkshire acquired 5.1 million shares of the media publishing company in the three months through December, a stake worth $351.7 million at yearend, according to a regulatory filing Tuesday.  Berkshire first bought a stake in Amazon in 2019.

headline: UBS Maintains Buy on American International Gr, Lowers Price Target to $92
summary: UBS  analyst Brian Meredith   maintains American International Gr (NYSE:AIG) with a Buy and lowers the price target from $94 to $92.

headline: Cantor Fitzgerald Maintains Neutral on American International Gr, Raises Price Target to $81
summary: Cantor Fitzgerald  analyst Ryan Tunis   maintains American International Gr (NYSE:AIG) with a Neutral and raises the price target from $77 to $81.

headline: The 5 Most Interesting Analyst Questions From AIG’s Q4 Earnings Call
summary: AIG’s fourth-quarter results drew a positive market response, as management cited disciplined underwriting, improved investment income, and strong execution on portfolio repositioning. CEO Peter Zaffino highlighted that international commercial growth, favorable reinsurance renewals, and ongoing expense reductions helped offset softness in North America property lines. Management also pointed to gains from new business, especially in international markets, and emphasized the benefits of a multi-
